name: Ammo Capacity
description: Increases the ammo capacity of your weapon

name: Damage
description: Increases the damage of your weapon

name: Health
description: Increases the max health of your character

name: Speed
description: Increases the movement speed of your character

name: Shrink
description: Decreases the size of your character

name: Bullet Speed
description: Increases the bullet speed of your weapon
